version_description: Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Minor improvements and bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes

A big update!

* Improvements to collisions in sand traps. Balls now bounce better in sand traps.
* Balls don't clump together
* Local notifications when you have packs available to be opened
* Ability to re-spec your base golfer attributes
* Fixed account recovery.
* Alerts on team button when team members are looking for a friendly match
* Fixed bug where some players could get stuck in water
* Spectators now can see what powerups are available to players in an active game
* Many, many, bug fixes and performance enhancements!

Bug fixes!
* Fixes bug on tee off shots.
* Fixes bug when hitting normally on a green reset

New Features!
- Card trading with members of your team!
- Ability to choose custom courses for friendly matches!
- Lots of bug fixes and performance improvements!
Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Minor bug fixes and performance enhancements.
Minor bug fixes.

Introducing Challenge Mode!
Challenge Mode is a fun new way to play Golf Blitz. Play in 1v1 matches that increase in difficulty but also in rewards. Get 12 wins before you get 3 losses to earn serious prizes and exclusive content. The more wins you get, the more you can win!
Challenges can be standard play or have special variants like Full Elixir, Low Gravity, No Cooldown and more!

- Updated some UI elements on Challenge Mode Scene
- Fixed some animations upon returning to menu from Challenge Mode Scene
- Sped up Connecting screen
Minor bug fixes.

DAILY DEALS!
- You can now exchange gems for cards in the Shop
- Added a Prompt and Alert to Secure Your Account with an Email Address
- Added Tips to the Matchmaking Screen
- Added Recover Account button to the Create Account Page for returning players
- Added notification toggle for Free Pack Ready
- Added notification for Card Trade Available
- Re-sorted Golfer Page so Ready To Unlock is at the top
- Added Social Links to Settings Popup
- Fixed some UI bugs & improved performance!
Localization improvements!
Fixed notification bug!
Localization improvements!

Added some super secret new golfers.
Some levels of card packs have more bux.
Fixed some minor UI bugs.

Introducing Challenge Mode!

Challenge Mode is a fun new way to play Golf Blitz. Play in 1v1 matches that increase in difficulty but also in rewards. Get 12 wins before you get 3 losses to earn serious prizes and exclusive content. The more wins you get, the more you can win!

Challenges can be standard play or have special variants like Full Elixir, Low Gravity, No Cooldown and more!

- Added unlockable emotes
- Redesigned text entry box
- Added a loading bar to the connecting screen

Challenges can be standard play or have special variants like Full Elixir, Low Gravity, No Cooldown and more!

- Added unlockable emotes
- Redesigned text entry box
- Added a loading bar to the connecting screen
- Fixed keyboard submit button

Introducing Challenge Mode!
Challenge Mode is a fun new way to play Golf Blitz. Play in 1v1 matches that increase in difficulty but also in rewards. Get 12 wins before you get 3 losses to earn serious prizes and exclusive content. The more wins you get, the more you can win!
Challenges can be standard play or have special variants like Full Elixir, Low Gravity, No Cooldown and more!

Introducing Challenge Mode!
Challenge Mode is a fun new way to play Golf Blitz. Play in 1v1 matches that increase in difficulty but also in rewards. Get 12 wins before you get 3 losses to earn serious prizes and exclusive content. The more wins you get, the more you can win!
Challenges can be standard play or have special variants like Full Elixir, Low Gravity, No Cooldown and more!

- Updated some UI elements on Challenge Mode Scene
- Fixed some animations upon returning to menu from Challenge Mode Scene
- Sped up Connecting screen

- Upgrading accuracy is now more effective
- Grenade Ball cost increased from 5 to 6 elixir. Tunnel Ball cost increased from 7 to 9 elixir. Repel Ball cost increased from 4 to 5 elixir. Space Ball cost increased from 3 to 4 elixir
- Grenade Balls now detonate other Grenade Balls in range and exert less maximum force
- Starting at Level 25 players start with an extra point of elixir every 5 levels.
- You may now redistribute powerup skill points

- Grenade Balls now detonate other Grenade Balls in range and exert less maximum force
- Starting at Level 25 players start with an extra point of elixir every 5 levels.
- You may now redistribute powerup skill points

- Grenade Ball cost increased from 5 to 6 elixir. Tunnel Ball cost increased from 7 to 9 elixir. Repel Ball cost increased from 4 to 5 elixir. Space Ball cost increased from 3 to 4 elixir
- Grenade Balls now detonate other Grenade Balls in range and exert less maximum force
- Starting at Level 25 players start with an extra point of elixir every 5 levels.

- Grenade Ball cost increased from 5 to 6 elixir. Tunnel Ball cost increased from 7 to 9 elixir. Repel Ball cost increased from 4 to 5 elixir. Space Ball cost increased from 3 to 4 elixir

- Upgrading accuracy is now more effective
- Grenade Ball cost increased from 5 to 6 elixir. Tunnel Ball cost increased from 7 to 9 elixir. Repel Ball cost increased from 4 to 5 elixir. Space Ball cost increased from 3 to 4 elixir
- Grenade Balls now detonate other Grenade Balls in range and exert less maximum force

Big Update!
- 4 New Powerups! Spider Ball, Saw Ball, Heavy Ball & Ghost Ball
- Replays! Rewatch your last 5 matches so you can screen record them and share them!
- Added previous leaderboards to leaders page
- Fixed going through sticky bug
- You can change your username once
- You can Rate each hole with a thumbs up or a thumbs down
- Added card trade details and last login time to your team info page

Big Update!
- 4 New Powerups! Spider Ball, Saw Ball, Heavy Ball & Ghost Ball
- Replays! Rewatch your last 10 matches so you can screen record them and share them!
- Added previous leaderboards to leaders page
- Fixed going through sticky bug
- You can change your username once
- You can Rate each hole with a thumbs up or a thumbs down
- Added card trade details and last login time to your team info page

- Laser Ball can now laser putt.
- Handle course data download failures.
- Redesigned respec power-ups button.
- Sorted buy and sell cards by the number available in the team pool.
- Resetting card trade timer on joining new team.
- Remove broken highest rank stat on teams.
- Revert Halloween icon.

- Laser Ball can laser putt for real this time.
- Handle course data download failures.
- Redesigned respec power-ups button.
- Sorted buy and sell cards by the number available in the team pool.
- Resetting card trade timer on joining new team.
- Remove broken highest rank stat on teams.
- Revert Halloween icon.
Bug fixes & performance improvements

- Fixed Spider Ball display bug
- Fixed an issue with tunnel ball exiting sand traps incorrectly

- Seasonal theme support
- Bug fixes & Performance improvements

Added seasonal themes support
Bug fixes & Performance improvements
Fixed a bug that caused touches to stop working mid-game
Bug fixes & Performance improvements

- Tunnel Ball's speed has been reduced
- Fixed a bug with Tunnel Ball water hazard collisions
- Bug fixes & Performance improvements
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bug fixes and performance improvements.

App name should now be back to "Golf Blitz"!

- Team captains and co-captains are now the only ranks that can edit team names and descriptions
- Optimized downloadable assets to reduce their size
- Fixed a spectator UI bug for games with less than 3 powerups that could cause a crash
- General bug fixes and performance improvements

New Feature: Friendly Match Lobby!
- Join or create a persistant Friendly Match lobby from your team page
- Easily set the course, avaialble powerups, and skill cap for your game
- See who’s in the lobby and manage players before the game starts
- Return to the Friendly Match lobby between games and play again
- More Friendly Match settings and features to come!

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed a bug that caused some team chat messages to show up as black boxes
- Fixed a visual bug with power-up selection in the ‘All Powerups’ challenge mode

In this version we've addressed some of the feedback regarding the new Friendly Match Lobby:
- Leaving a Friendly Match Lobby returns you to the team page
- Friendly Match Lobby indicates if a joined player is inactive
- Reduced the number of Friendly Match messages shown in team chat
- Other bug fixes and performance improvements.

New in 1.12.1
New Feature: Friendly Match Lobby!
- Join or create a persistant Friendly Match lobby from your team page
- Easily set the course, avaialble powerups, and skill cap for your game
- See who’s in the lobby and manage players before the game starts
- Return to the Friendly Match lobby between games and play again

- Progress for any active seasonal event is displayed in player info dialog
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Tunnel Ball now affected by sticky and acid hazards
- Tunnel Ball only slowed down while in terrain
- Heavy Ball elixir cost increased by 1
- Heavy Ball power reduced
- Support for additional course design elements
- Powerups sorted in unlock order during game play
- Other small bug fixes and improvements

- Added Friendly Match lobby chat! Send messages to other players in the lobby while setting up a friendly game.
- Addressed an issue that could cause balls to be pushed into terrain in some cases
- Updated some localizations
- Fixed an issue with entering an account recovery code
- Added support for additional legendary golfer customizations
- Other bug fixes and optimizations

- Fixed an issue where some players who unlocked Tunnelball weren't able to select it in Friendly Matches.
- Powerup cards in Friendly Match lobby now show the correct powerup level
- Altered the calculation for the displayed 'Newtons' value for all balls (no changes in-game)
- Fixed ball trails not displaying for some golfers

- Added an all-new Friends List! Invite friends, play customized friendly matches and compare trophies with your Golf Blitz friends!
- Team and Friends List have been moved into the new Social Menu
- Added an option in settings to select a customized favorite page of emotes
- Heavy Ball power increased slightly
- Added an ability to report users for inappropriate behavior
- View the stats of your opponents in the lobby by tapping on their golfer icon

- Return to the shop after opening daily deals, special offers or other card packs purchased from the shop
- Added new team icons!
- Fixed a crash on iPads that occurred when using the “Share Invite” button
- Other minor bug fixes and improvements

- Sort your friends list alphabetically or by trophies
- Improved experience of inviting friends to a friendly match
- Several behind-the-scenes optimizations and improvements

- Behind the scenes optimizations that should make Golf Blitz faster, more responsive and use less data.
- Grenaded some minor bugs off the map.

Better compatibility with devices running iOS 14
Other bug fixes & performance improvements

- Support for new Challenge Modes inlacing the upcoming Fast Forward mode!
- Improved some translations
- Other minor bug fixes
Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Toggle starting elixir in friendly matches
- Improved tutorial
- New seasonal icon
Bug fixes & performance improvements

- Introducing In-game Emotes! Laugh, cry and react immediately to things that happen during gameplay!
- Change your in-game emotes by setting up customized favorite emotes in the settings.
- Plus other minor bug fixes
This update includes several small improvements and bug fixes plus adds support for some new seasonal content!
Bug fixes

- Cleaned up after the holidays, swept the chimney, took down the tree.
- Some minor under-the-hood changes and improvements.
- Behind-the-scenes optimizations and fixes.

- Replays now play back in-game emotes
- Updated golfer page layout
- Team leader board rankings history no longer changes when a team is deleted

Introducing a new way to customize your golfer!
Check out the new Accessories tab to equip legendary customizations like balls, trails, effects and sounds!
Earn new accessory cards by winning special challenges, participating in events or purchase them with Legendary golfer bundles in the shop!

- Added accessory cards!
- Existing Legendary golfer/hats with special accessories will be upgraded to the new system
- Items that aren't included in normal card packs are now denoted with a special card shape.
- Emote Favourites page is now saved to your persistent profile
- In-game emote picker will now fill missing favourites with default emotes
- Other small fixes and improvements
- Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

- Introducing Epic card trading! You can now sell Epic cards into your team card pool starting at level 30.
- Increased Trading Token limits at level 30 and higher.
- Legendary balls now roll in game!
- Lobby shows a preview of each player's equipped ball
- Other minor tweaks and improvements!

- Introducing Epic card trading! You can now sell Epic cards into your team card pool starting at level 30.
- Increased Trading Token limits at level 30 and higher.
- Legendary balls now roll in game!
- Lobby shows a preview of each player's equipped ball
- Other minor tweaks and improvements!
